FuncDef: This command changes the reporting reason in an intermediate interrogation when the final granted units have been consumed and a correspondingout-of-credit-actiondifferent fromdisconnect-hostis started.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the reporting reason in an intermediate interrogation when the final granted units have been consumed and a corresponding out-of-credit-action different from disconnect-host is started.
Specifies the reporting reason in an intermediate interrogation when the final granted units have been consumed and a corresponding out-of-credit-action different from disconnect-host is started.
